mapper.sql:
SELECT free_code, title, reg_date, hit, name, member_code, story FROM free
title LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}), '%')
mapper.select:
SELECT free_code, title, reg_date, hit, name, member_code, story FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, sub.* FROM () sub)
WHERE rnum >= ((#{page} - 1 ) * #{perPage} + 1) and rnum <= (#{page} * #{perPage}) ORDER BY free_code desc
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO free ( free_code, title, hit, name, reg_date,member_code, story)
VALUES (FREE_CODE_SEQ.nextval,#{title}, 0, #{name}, sysdate, #{member_code},#{story} )
mapper.update: UPDATE FREE SET hit = hit + 1 WHERE free_code = #{free_code}
